name: Villager
heading: NPT-01: Villager (Generic)
desc: Average build, simple tunic and trousers. Earth tones.

name: Merchant
heading: NPT-02: Merchant
desc: Traveling traders and market vendors. Rich clothing, trade goods.

name: Farmer
heading: NPT-03: Farmer
desc: Sturdy build, practical clothing. Agricultural workers in settled zones.

name: Guard
heading: NPT-05: Guard
desc: Settlement and zone protectors. Armor and weapons.

name: Child
heading: NPT-06: Child
desc: Young villagers. Quick, curious, bouncy walk.

name: Elder
heading: NPT-07: Elder
desc: Senior community members. Slow walk, wise demeanor.

name: Fisher
heading: NPT-08: Fisher
desc: Dockside and lakeside workers. Practical waterside clothing.

name: Innkeeper
heading: NPT-09: Innkeeper
desc: Tavern and rest-stop operators. Warm, welcoming.

name: Woodcutter
heading: NPT-10: Woodcutter
desc: Frontier workers and lumber gatherers. Strong build.

name: Audiomancer
heading: NPT-11: Audiomancer
desc: Sound-magic practitioners. Flowing robes with musical motifs.

name: Preserver Agent
heading: NPT-12: Preserver Agent
desc: Preserver faction field operatives. Crystalline accents.

name: Ridgewalker
heading: NPT-13: Ridgewalker
desc: Mountain territory scouts and guides. Weathered, climbing gear.

name: Shopkeeper
heading: NPT-14: Shopkeeper
desc: Local goods vendors. Aprons, organized displays.

name: Healer
heading: NPT-15: Healer
desc: Herbalists and medical practitioners. Pouches, herbs.
